notice.restricted: New registration to this wiki is restricted.
notice.restricted_defail: In order to start using it, approval by the administrator is necessary after new registration.
notice.google_account_continue: Please decide user ID, name and password and continue registration.

form_help.email: In this wiki, only the following e-mail address can be registered.
form_help.password: Please enter at least 6 letters, numbers, alphanumeric characters, symbols etc for password.
form_help.user_id: The user ID is used for the URL of the user page etc. Only half-width alphanumeric characters and some symbols can be used.

form_help.google_connect1: With Google Connect, you can sign in with your Google Account.
form_help.google_connect2: Only Google Apps accounts with the following email addresses are connectable Google accounts:
form_help.google_disconnect1: If disconnet Google, you can not login by Google Authentication.
form_help.google_disconnect2: After disconnect, you can login using email and password.

notice.update_token1: With updating, the new API Token will be generated.
notice.update_token2: You have to update the processes using the current API Token.

notice.version: This is not the current version.
notice.restricted: Access to this page is restricted

help.redirect: Redirect to the new page if someone access %s

basic.title: 基本的な機能
basic.body1: 表示される画面には、「一覧ページ」と「ページ」の2種類があります
basic.body2: スラッシュ / で終わるページは、その階層の一覧ページとなります。
basic.body3: ページでの変更はすべて記録されています。History からそのページの過去の状態を見ることができます。

tips.title: 編集のコツ
tips.body1: 文章の 構造 を意識しましょう。本を書くように、内容と文脈を整理してセクション・サブセクション...と構造的に書くと、わかりやすく他人に伝わりやすいページがになります。
